name: flower-veil
caption: Flower Veil

effect.short: Protects friendly []{type:grass} Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
effect.full: Protects friendly []{type:grass} Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

flavorText:
Ally Grass-type Pokémon are protected from
status conditions and the lowering of their stats.
